title: Asshole
alt: [Shortly thereafter, at a nearby bakery] ::CRASH:: ::RUMBLE:: ::VRRRRRR:: '... I don't know, officer. It just scooped up an entire rack of scones and drove away!'
transcript:
[A couple watches Beret Guy drive by in an SUV.]
Cueball: Look at that asshole in his SUV, thinking he's so badass while he guzzles gas driving around suburbia.
Beret Guy: Oh no! Am I an asshole? I hope not![Beret Guy trades in his keys at the dealership.][Now he is driving by in a hybrid sedan.]
Megan: Look at that smug asshole thinking he's better than us because he drives a hybrid.
Beret Guy: ...[He trades in his keys again.][The couple is standing.]
Off-panel: RUMBLE[Beret Guy drives a backhoe in and smacks the couple out of the panel with the digger.][He drives off, whistling.]
